content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. Moving in a clockwise direction from the purse, the elements on the path are a taxicab, a Nile crocodile, an academic gown, a baseball, a convertible, a Carolina anole, an English Setter, a feather boa, a rock beauty, a badger, a red-breasted merganser, an agama, a gondola, a cuirass, a Basset Hound, a red fox, a carton, a Geoffroy's spider monkey, and a cleaver.
